-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | capture IO action's stdout and stderr
--   
--   capture IO action's stdout and stderr
@package io-capture
@version 0.3

module System.IO.Capture

-- | Takes an IO as action to run, and a String as given stdin, then
--   returns whole stdout and stderr as String of tuple.
--   
--   <pre>
--   import System.IO.Capture (capture)
--   
--   main = print =&lt;&lt; capture (getLine &gt;&gt;= putStr) "foobar"
--     -- prints ("foobar","")
--   </pre>
capture :: IO a -> String -> IO (String, String)
